page.title: 16Farming (1)
page.content: A small dairy farm. The{dairy farmer has been on this farm for 18 years although he has farmed in the area for 35 years altogether. His farm is aproximately 106 acres and is one of the largest farms in the area. He produces{37,000}litres of milk per month from a herd of 150{Fresian cows. He sells his milk to the{Milk {Marketing Board}who collect his milk twice a day in a tanker. Although the {E.E.C}guarantees a price for each litre of milk produced, they have recently cut his milk quotas due to overproduction in the EEC of this produce. He employers two workers and grows some{maize,}but no{cereal crops. He hopes his children will one day take over the running of the farm.
